00004 
00006 PUDumper::PUDumper(const edm::ParameterSet& iConfig)
00007 {
00008   //  MCPileupTag_ = iConfig.getParameter<edm::InputTag>("MCPileupTag");
00009   
00010   // create TTree
00011   edm::Service<TFileService> fs;
00012   PUTree_ = fs -> make<TTree>("pileup","pileup");
00013   
00014   PUTree_ -> Branch("runNumber",     &runNumber,     "runNumber/I");
00015   PUTree_ -> Branch("eventNumber",   &eventNumber, "eventNumber/l");
00016   PUTree_ -> Branch("lumiBlock",     &lumiBlock,     "lumiBlock/I");
00017 
00018   PUTree_ -> Branch("nBX",      &nBX,              "nBX/I");
00019   PUTree_ -> Branch("BX",       BX_,              "BX[nBX]/I");
00020   PUTree_ -> Branch("nPUtrue",  &nPUtrue_,    "nPUtrue/I");
00021   PUTree_ -> Branch("nPUobs",   nPUobs_,      "nPUobs[nBX]/I");
00022 }
00023

00030 {}

00035 
00037 void PUDumper::analyze(const edm::Event& iEvent, const edm::EventSetup& iSetup)
00038 {
00039   // get the PU collection
00040   edm::Handle<std::vector<PileupSummaryInfo> > PupInfo;
00041   if( !iEvent.isRealData() ){
00042     iEvent.getByLabel(edm::InputTag("addPileupInfo"), PupInfo); 
00043   } else return;
00044   
00045   
00046   runNumber = iEvent.id().run();
00047   eventNumber = iEvent.id().event();
00048   if( iEvent.isRealData() ) {
00049     lumiBlock = iEvent.luminosityBlock();
00050   } else {
00051     lumiBlock = -1;
00052   }
00053 
00054   // loop on BX
00055   nBX=0;
00056   std::vector<PileupSummaryInfo>::const_iterator PVI;
00057   nPUtrue_ = PupInfo -> begin()->getTrueNumInteractions();
00058 
00059   for(PVI = PupInfo->begin(); PVI != PupInfo->end(); ++PVI){
00060     BX_[nBX]      = PVI -> getBunchCrossing();
00061     nPUobs_[nBX]  = PVI -> getPU_NumInteractions();
00062 #ifdef DEBUG    
00063     std::cout << "PUDumper::runNumber: " << runNumber_
00064               << "   BX[1]: "      << BX_[1]
00065               << "   nPUtrue: " << nPUtrue_
00066               << "   nPUobs[1]: "  << nPUobs_[1]
00067               << std::endl;
00068 #endif
00069     nBX++;
00070   }    
00071   PUTree_ -> Fill();
00072 }
00073 
00074 DEFINE_FWK_MODULE(PUDumper);
